sources.title: Paradise Express 1937 colorized (Grant Withers)
sources.description: A small railroad is being squeezed out of business by the tactics of a trucking company owned by gangsters. Grant Withers, Dorothy Appleby, Arthur Hoyt, Harry Davenport, Maude Eburne, Donald Kirke Edited for television. I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
